description: IEEE YESIST 12 [Youth Endeavours For Social Innovation Using Sustainable Technology] 2021 -  Maker Fair ( Registration Deadline Extended - 15th July 2021 )
additional_info: IEEE YESIST 12 [Youth Endeavours For Social Innovation Using Sustainable Technology] 2021 is an international talent show for students and young professionals to showcase their innovative ideas to solve humanitarian and social issues affecting directly the community around them. Maker Fair is a track under IEEE YESIST 12 which serves as a unique window of opportunity for the innovators, makers, creators and Tech enthusiasts to showcase their marvellous products to the international community. Teams with zeal and determination of inventing and showcasing their innovative projects/products are invited to register for this event.
